(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$
\.avi$
\.ico$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\.
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.png$
\.wav$
\.vy$
^documents/knowledge/[eE]lements\.(md|txt)$
^static/parsed_yaml\.js$
^tests/test_elements.py$
